attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This government led the UK into a war with Iraq on flimsey evidence of WMD. The march into Afgansitan rode on the back of 911. Both these wars are orchestrated by the US. At what stage will our government listen to its people and say enough is enough. Let our troops protect our sovreignty not fight an unwinnable war against a people who have nothing else but their religeon to rely on.
Withdraw our troops now and prove that this government has a mind of its own.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
